feed.title: North East Margaree - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 12:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: N 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5 except zero along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. High plus 5 except zero along parts of the coast. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
